```{r import, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, include=TRUE}

library(pacman)
p_load(tidyverse)

df <- read_delim(here::here('write', 'input', 'spd-alpr-pub.csv.gz'), delim='|')

plate_freq <- df %>% 
  group_by(plate_hash) %>% 
  summarize(n = n()) %>% 
  mutate(freq = n/sum(n))

avg_reads <- mean(plate_freq$n)

```

The average number of ALPR reads per unique plate is: `r avg_reads`
